text: Killing Me Softly is a studio album by American singer-songwriter Roberta Flack. It was released on August 1, 1973 by Atlantic Records. Flack recorded the album with producer Joel Dorn for 18 months. ==Track listing== # "Killing Me Softly with His Song" (Charles Fox, Norman Gimbel) 4:49 # "Jesse" (Janis Ian) 4:03 # "No Tears (In the End)" (Ralph MacDonald, William Salter) 4:56 # "I'm the Girl" (James Alan Shelton) 4:55 # "River" (Gene McDaniels) 5:03 # "Conversation Love" (Terry Plumeri, Bill Seighman) 3:43 # "When You Smile" (Ralph MacDonald, William Salter) 3:44 # "Suzanne" (Leonard Cohen) 9:44 ==References== Category:1973 albums Category:Blues albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Killing Me Softly
